channel.title: How Often do You Finish What You Start?
channel.description: How often do you finish your songs? [poll min=1 public=true] * Always * Almost Always * Sometimes * Almost Never * Never [/poll]

item.title: How Often do You Finish What You Start?
item.dc:creator: Kerfuffle
item.description:
I have hundreds of unfinished projects and a whole bunch on my google drive i can’t access when i was clearing space before the apple files update.
I usually put them down until i learn more and can come back and perfect an idea.

Read full topic
item.source: How Often do You Finish What You Start?

item.title: How Often do You Finish What You Start?
item.dc:creator: BALLISTIK
item.description:
Me: I tend to get an intro, and a buildup to my first drop, but then, I have a difficult time finding the balance between repetition and introducing new material.
I feel like this is a major hurdle I have to clear before I can get recognized as a songwriter/producer.

Read full topic
item.source: How Often do You Finish What You Start?

item.title: How Often do You Finish What You Start?
item.dc:creator: NotMiles
item.description:
If you run out of ideas, watch Andrew Huang.
If you do have ideas, watch Andrew Huang anyways.
If you’re bored, watch Andrew Huang.

What I’m trying to say is, watch Andrew Huang.

Read full topic
item.source: How Often do You Finish What You Start?

item.title: How Often do You Finish What You Start?
item.dc:creator: MusicMakingMarco
item.description:
When I have a loop or a track and can’t seem to make a song out of it but it sounds great, I’ll move it to my Ideas project, have at least 20 loops there waiting for me to use

item.source: How Often do You Finish What You Start?

item.title: How Often do You Finish What You Start?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
If I compare the number of starter ideas, loops, etc… I’ve created to the number of tracks I’ve put on SC, I fall somewhere between ‘Sometimes’ and ‘Almost never’.

If I’m talking about whether I’m happy to sign-off on anything I’ve created so far as being finished, final and ‘ready for release’, that drops to ‘Never’.

Read full topic
item.source: How Often do You Finish What You Start?

item.title: How Often do You Finish What You Start?
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
i usually get like 70% of the way done with the track itself. But i can never get around to actually ever finishing them. They just kind of sit there on my computer, nearly done, but not really good yet.

Read full topic
item.source: How Often do You Finish What You Start?

item.title: How Often do You Finish What You Start?

item.description:

item.source: How Often do You Finish What You Start?

item.title: How Often do You Finish What You Start?
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
It’s somewhere between sometimes and almost always. I have like 20 or so untitled projects that are literally a single loop it’s kinda crazy xD but usually I’ll stick with an idea if it’s more than me messing around.

Read full topic
item.source: How Often do You Finish What You Start?

item.title: How Often do You Finish What You Start?
item.dc:creator: Prysm
item.description:
It seems that most of the time I’ll have a song in my head and I’ve just been developing it in my head all day and then I get home and start trying to make it and I just can’t get the sound that I want and I eventually have to botch the whole thing.

Read full topic
